title: FS: T206 Rube Waddell Sovereign (Throwing) SGC 2.5

posts.post_title: FS: T206 Rube Waddell Sovereign (Throwing) SGC 2.5
posts.post_content:
Both front and back are clean, with no toning stains. I'm afraid don't have the greatest scanner for SGC slabs. Asking $650 shipped, PayPal preferred.
